description: When attempting to run a program using datetime values, a runtime error occurs when the program attempts to compare two datetime objects. The error states that the objects are not comparable, even though they are both datetime objects.
code:
import datetime

# Get current date and time
now = datetime.datetime.now()

# Get date
date_today = now.date()

# Get time
time_now = now.time()

# Get year
year =
